Owner of WayneConcepts.com, web design,web hosting, creative ideas, designs, apparel, sculpting, logo creation and file conversions.

Vice-President at CNY Awards & Apparel, Inc in charge of all graphics & design, signs, sublimation printing, vehicle graphics.

I created this blog a few years ago only as a means for my customer to contact me and submit ideas for creation. Since then I have found the fun in Twitter, Facebook and YouTube and needed a way to congeal it all together.

A WordPress Platform suited the purpose to a tee and since then I have become very skilled at installing and customizing WordPress based sites.
